author: kfogel
msg: Add regression test for issue #1421:
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py
(split_branch): Just do a straight conversion with branches and
tags, and fail because the conversion throws an exception.
* test-data/split-branch-cvsrepos/: New test data.

author: kfogel
msg: Make an optimization discovered while investigating issue #1421:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(SymbolicNameTracker.fill_name): Don't bother to descend when
candidate source branch is same as the branch being created.

author: sussman
msg: Apache's mod_deflate buffers entire responses, which causes svn
clients to timeout on large operations that normally have streamed
responses.  Until mod_deflate is fixed and httpd-2.0.48 is released,
the svn client will *not* request compression by default.  Users must
set 'http-compression = yes' to get compression.
[Keep in mind that 'compression' here is really about compressing the
XML-bodies sent by apache, which are usually small compared to the
file-contents retrieved by the client's multiple GET requests.  The
GET responses are always binary svndiff (vdelta), which is already
compressed to some degree.  So the impact of this change is minimal.]
* libsvn_ra_dav/session.c (get_server_settings): have compress_str
default to "no".

author: pll
msg: * notes/releases.txt
Updated to expand the directions for people unfamiliar with the
particulars of release management as the differ from a normal
development environment.

author: kraai
msg: Fix Debian bug #187331: Make svn_load_dirs work with absolute paths.
* tools/client-side/svn_load_dirs.pl.in: Create parent directories for
tags, not targets.
